publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1452 Rosie Kane: Homeless World Cup 2004-That the Parliament congratulates Jamie Shearer, Kevin Short, Robert Cairney, David Duke, Gary Kimmet, Eddie O'Neill, Owen Turner, Phil Garden, Shawn Schofield, Thomas Comrie, Mark Elliot and John McAnnany who have been selected to represent Scotland in the Homeless World Cup which will be staged in Gothenburg, Sweden in July 2004; regrets, furthermore, that last year our magnificent team, who picked up a trophy in their group, were not given the send off, media coverage or welcome that they deserve and hopes that the Parliament will attempt to rectify that shortfall this year by getting behind our boys and actively promoting them; further notes that the Homeless World Cup team is not only a successful and winning team, but is also an example of huge triumph over often extreme difficulty and to this end deserves the support, encouragement and praise of the Parliament, and calls on the Minister for Tourism, Culture and Sport to work with the Minister for Finance and Public Services in order to find funding to assist the cash-strapped team.
